/* New Atom Modal */ var newAtomModal = { triggerText: 'New Atom', title: 'New Atom', content:

Add some content to the new atom

, footer: { className: 'btn btn-primary', value: 'Create', action: 'new_atom_modal()' } }; /*New Scheme Modal*/ var newSchemeModal = { triggerText: 'New Scheme', title: 'New Scheme', content:

Select a scheme

, footer: { className:'btn btn-primary', value:'Create', action:'add_new_scheme_node()' } }; /* Edit Content Modal */ var editContentModal = { triggerText:'editContentModal', title: 'Edit Atom Content', content:

Edit atom content

, footer: { className: 'btn btn-primary', value: 'Save', action: 'edit_atom_content()' } }; /* Edit Metadata Modal */ var editMetaDataModal = { triggerText: 'Edit Meta', title: 'Edit Metadata', content:

Edit atom content

, footer: { className: 'btn btn-primary', value:'Save', action:"" }, }; /* Edit Scheme Type Modal */ var editSchemeTypeModal = { triggerText: 'Edit', title: 'Edit Scheme', content:

Select a scheme

, footer: { className:'btn btn-primary', value: 'Save', action: 'edit_scheme_content()' } }; /* New Resource Pane Type Selection Modal */ var newResourceModal = { triggerText: 'new Resource', title: 'New Resource Pane', content:

Select a resource type

, footer: { className: 'btn btn-primary', value: 'Add', action: 'add_tab()' } }; /*Reset Confirmation Modal */ resetConfirmModal = { triggerText: 'Reset', title: 'Reset MonkeyPuzzle', content:

Are you sure that you want to reset MonkeyPuzzle?
This will empty the current analysis and adjust all options back to their initial settings.

, footer: { className: 'btn btn-danger', value: 'Reset', action: 'mp_reset()' } }; /* Help Modal */ var helpModal = { triggerText: 'Help', title: 'Help', content:

MonkeyPuzzle uses a 3 pane layout. The visualisation pane is in the center, the resource pane is to the left, and the application menu is to the right.

Keybord Shortcuts:

  • a - Create a new atom
  • d - Delete the selected node
  • h - Display this delightfully helpful modal
  • m - Toggle display of the menu
  • r - Toggle display of the resource pane
  • Cmd/Ctrl-z - Undo
  • Cmd/Ctrl-y - Redo
, footer: { className: 'btn btn-primary', value: 'Dismiss' } }; module.exports = {data: newAtomModal}
